casebody.data:
Francine REIBMAN, a married woman, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
Jay H. MYERS, a/k/a Jay M. Myers, a married man, Defendant,
and
Wells Fargo Bank, N.A., Trustee for Carrington Mortgage Loan Trust, Series 2006-NC3 Asset-Backed Pass-Through Certificates, a National Association, Defendant-Respondent. C-210 Sept. Term 2017
079841 Supreme Court of New Jersey. October 20, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000332-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
